availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Kinnaird (Garrard County, Kentucky, bank cashier)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, bank cashier. Ohio native. Married to Patsy White "Pattie" McKee in Garrard County on October 8, 1846.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, Film #000183256, p. 264.
